website_summaries.verdict: The sheer volume and quality of practice problems and practice exams in this book is  hard to beat. If you must choose only one series, this is the one to go with.
pros: It's hard to beat a series written by the authors of the actual GRE exam
Practice problems are on point: the style and complexity of questions are in line with what you would expect on test day
cons: The series does not provide "tricks" and strategies like other test prep companies that are designed to help you with shortcuts and pattern recognition
The answer key descriptions are also not very comprehensive

customer_reviews.title: This set is amazing. there is also a guy on youtube who ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. there is also a guy on youtube who does every single problem word for word out and explains how to do it. amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: Fifty Bucks Versus Your Entire Future- Your Choice.
customer_reviews.text: Don't read my review trying to see if the product is good, you know you don't have a choice. The same company makes the test and are you really going to consider not buying the practice books for THEIR test? Just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this is in a super power pack bundle if I'm essentially buying duplicates of ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were 3 separate books with their own content. Turns out, the 2 smaller verbal reasoning and the quantitative reasoning (math) books are included in the larger GRE general test book. So I basically bought duplicates. Not sure why this is in a super power pack bundle if I'm essentially buying duplicates of the same content. Do yourself a favor and only buy the 3rd edition GRE general test booklet (597 pages). Unfortunately, I didn't realize this until many months down the line and I can't return the two smaller books.
customer_reviews.author: Arend Folkens

customer_reviews.title: Don’t need all three
customer_reviews.text: I like the study book but the two smaller books are the same as what’s in the one big general book. Could have just bought the general book by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanyb44

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book for reviewing for the GRE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book for reviewing for the GRE. Used it to study for 9 weeks in addition to the 5 lb. Manhattan Prep before taking the exam. I took the practice test at the back 1 week before the exam and I scored only 1 point off from what my actual GRE score was a week later. Highly recommend if you are serious about buckling down and studying. Questions are from old exams and accurately reflected the level of difficulty I saw on real exam.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This in conjunction with the Manhattan Prep Material is Priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smaller books are EXACTLY the same with just a few extra practice problems. Waste of paper.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to find that the quantitative reasoning and verbal reasoning books have the same exact review as the big main book that comes with the set........ the only difference is some practice problems. So I just paid a lot for pretty much only needing one of the books and wasted paper for no reason seeing as it is pointless to make a set of books that don't vary much.......
customer_reviews.author: Miccia

customer_reviews.title: Completely Useful
customer_reviews.text: There were a ton of examples in these books that gave me a good look into what was coming my way. I would suggest it for anyone attempting the GRE. My scores went from 29th percentile qual to 58th percentile qual. For quan I initially scored in the 40th percentile, and after the book I went to the 67th percentile.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Robert Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra practice questions/tests
customer_reviews.text: If you keep in mind that the writers of this book create the test, so it’s a great resource available! I didn’t find the review sections to be different in each book. For example, the math review in the quantitative practice question book is the exact same quantitative review in the combined “Guide to GRE” book (Which by the way, can also be printed for FREE on their website!!). So if you need more math review, you’ll probably need another source. However, this pack was worth the extra practice questions and prepared me for that. Good luck, fellow studiers!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly smith

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already.
customer_reviews.text: What I can say, it has a full math review which is very helpful, but the way the book "explains" the math is not really explaining so I have to use khan acadamy or friends to explain the stuff it doesnt. To be honest. Theres no better option for studying for the GRE, its put out by the creators. So stop reading my review and just buy the thing. I'm sure you will do great on the GRE.
customer_reviews.author: Kiddameh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Just get a 5lb book of questions and use free materials online. The math review and quantitative sections of the book are available word for word online. If anything, the General Test guide includes everything you would need from ETS. They are repeated word for word between the 3 different books. If you were to disregard the redundant material between the 3 books you would have one average test prep book. Actually a little upset. Luckily I didn’t pay full price, otherwise I would’ve been pissed. By the time I made it to the second book the return window was closed. Not surprised though. Emblematic of the issues within the Education system.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Honestly
customer_reviews.text: I have read the first couple pages and it seems like they would help. I was suppose to study during winter break but it’s called a break for a reason. I still haven’t studied for it so pray for me plz
customer_reviews.author: Zaynab

customer_reviews.title: Good for learning, not for practicing.
customer_reviews.text: They give you lots of good info, but the practice questions don’t explain how they get the answers. It’s not helpful if you don’t know what you’re doing wrong. I personally had a way better experience with the Manhattan Prep 5 lb book of practice questions. It doesn’t teach you like these books do, but the questions actually resemble GRE questions and the answers pages shows you how to get to that answer.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Cortus

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice questions, but not much else
customer_reviews.text: If you're just looking for a large bank of official practice questions, this is a great resource. However, the other parts of the book are, in my opinion, not very useful. This was particularly apparent in the math "review" section, where many formulas or shortcuts are presented with little context. To make matters worse, the answers to these review problems don't include any sort of explanation, which means that you'll have to go elsewhere to actually understand any concepts that you don't immediately grasp. In the end, you're basically paying 40 dollars for some practice tests, two of which are already available online for free (albeit without answers & explanations).
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price. Lots of information to go through.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this prep for the GRE to apply to a PhD program, as I haven't been enrolled in a program for a while and needed to brush up on math skills I haven't used in over 20 years. The value for the product is excellent - you get a lot for your money. The books go really in depth, so it is best to plan ahead with this order so you have time to fully utilize the resource.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Prep Material
customer_reviews.text: I got these books about 2 weeks before I took the GRE. The practice exercises and tests helped me feel adequately prepared when I took the test. The way the books are broken down makes studying manageable and less overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found some errors in the books
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only gone through the quantitative and verbal reasoning books, not the main book component. But I’ve found typos/mistakes in both so far. Hoping the only mistakes are the ones that it’s easy to catch, and nothing that is teaching me incorrectly. I will update my review after more studying and taking the GRE about how well prepared the books left me.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The explanations for the math problems leave huge gaps not allowing you to understand. It’s basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GRE book review
customer_reviews.text: Explanations are terrible. In outfit the cracking the GRE by Princeton review and it was so much more helpful at explaining answers. This book is good for practice problems but I would not recommend using it as a primary study book.
customer_reviews.author: chardae

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book really helped me prepare for the exam. I found that going through the explanations to their answers helped me think like the question writers and get more answers correct (330/340).
customer_reviews.author: David Teitge

customer_reviews.title: Great but super pack is not necessary
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot of great material, and it’s written by the test creators so it is excellent and relevant practice. The strategies and tips are super SUPER helpful. The super pack is a lot of material, a bit too much but if you have an ample a lot of time go for it or If you want to have extra extra extra practice then good. The main book includes all three sections and the two smaller ones are extra practice for math and the vocab section. I think the regular book alone would be great for the majority. Do yourself a favor and read the tips and strategies.
customer_reviews.author: Mell

customer_reviews.title: Too repetitive, not work it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to help me study for the GRE but I’m slowly finding it is a waste of money. Yes it helps you understand test content and structure but as for explanations and problem types it is lacking. For example this pack includes 3 books but majority of the questions are just repeated in each book, I don’t think I’d spend money on this set again, I think buying a better variety is a better suggestion...
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used these books to study for the GRE (this along with some free online material that I found). I took a practice test prior to studying & ended up with a 299. After studying, I took the official exam and got a 315. I would recommend this to anyone who plans to take the GRE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been my saving grace. Hundreds of practice problems. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent review for gre
customer_reviews.text: I managed to score very well on the gre. However, the math problems are easier than the test. I recommend supplementary math review.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N

customer_reviews.title: GR-EASY
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing with these books and the online practice, the GRE felt pretty easy when I took it. Reasonable price too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: I only used this study set to study for my exam. I think it provides all the necessary materials to prepare for the exam. Some of the questions/examples provided were redundant (they repeated throughout the book/carried onto the next book), but I did find the book extremely helpful in my preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: The explanation for the math part are totally confusing and hard to understand. Does have some support on YouTube but it never mention on the package
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Good information but sterile, impersonal tone
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great information, but ultimately it reads like a longer version of the instructions that come with the test. It's certainly very helpful, but its language has the feeling of something a discontented proctor would read to you in a monotone. If that's your thing, I definitely recommend this product. But if you're looking for something with a friendlier tone, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in one package. Ordered this in a bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D.

customer_reviews.title: General and efficient way to start GRE
customer_reviews.text: Explanation about Quantitative section will make you indulge in to Quant easily and comprehensively. With practical exercise per chapters, you can acquire skills for actual exam. Moreover, Every question has explanation about it so you don't need to worry about your initial level of GRE solving skill before study these books.
customer_reviews.author: Taehoon

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: Great package but just one book with everything in it will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice test!
customer_reviews.text: This book is good for practice tests, but Manhattan prep books are FAR better for my learning style. They give simple and easy to understand strategies and explanations on things we used to know, but after 4 years of college, we tend to forget.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this GRE prep books for my upcoming GRE test in August. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My young daughter is studying for her master So she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Idelma R.

customer_reviews.title: I found that the quantitative practice book and the GRE ...
customer_reviews.text: I found that the quantitative practice book and the GRE book are very similar, because they have identical activities but one with more explanations. I think they shouldn't use similar exercices on both books. So for me the price is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HADIA.Z

customer_reviews.title: OG: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great package to learn about GRE. I enjoy Kindle version, so I can search for my notes more easily.
customer_reviews.author: YP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't really explain how to do certain math equations or why?
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Than

customer_reviews.title: Big heavy book, made the wife happy...
customer_reviews.text: Good book, bought it for my wife preparing for her entry into her Nursing DNP
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L Hyers

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety, Explanations
customer_reviews.text: This book provides a lot of preparation tips that I found helpful. The questions and practice exams are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: There was so much helpful information. Too bad it didn’t help me not procrastinate studying lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Practice questions only!
customer_reviews.text: Did not provide guides through concepts and questions. Just a bunch of practice questions. More of a practice book than a study book.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great offer for the official books.
customer_reviews.text: It's all three books at a way cheaper price than ETS' website.
customer_reviews.author: Sahed

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The math review section was so helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The math review section was so helpful and going through real questions helped me know what areas I had to work on most. This made me feel so much more prepared for the test
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: The books worked! Purchased them and passed the GRE, no studying required. Very helpful to familiarize yourself with the type of questions on the test.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package for my wife. Indeed, it is really good, however, it would be ideal if there they was a CD too for practice...
customer_reviews.author: Evangelos Koutronas

customer_reviews.title: New Books
customer_reviews.text: They arrived new so they’re in good shape. I haven’t tried the online stuff yet but these seem like they’ll be pretty helpful in studying.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Covers the basics, but not much more.
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad, covered all the basics and went over a decent amount of sample questions. However, I wish it had more in depth explanations and more practice problems! I would recommend investing in the Manhattan GRE Prep Books!
customer_reviews.author: Deepali Balasubramani

customer_reviews.title: Very good guide.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. She said they were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much all you need to prepare for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Raven C

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for studying for the GRE. Best choice out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: “New” but actually used
customer_reviews.text: The book itself? Great. Very helpful. From this seller? Not so much. Bought it “new” but it had a whole bunch of writing in it when it arrived. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not needed
customer_reviews.text: Did not need the books, I’m sure they are fine but because it is ETS who is pushing this it gets 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great study guide for GRE. Helped me increase score by 20 percentiles
customer_reviews.author: Rich13

customer_reviews.title: Study Study Study
customer_reviews.text: Been using these books for practice tests to study for the GRE and so far have been really helpful
customer_reviews.author: MicMcC

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpfuk GRE Prep for someone with little time to study
customer_reviews.text: I find out very helpful and am happy with my GRE scores. I liked the succinct reviews and the abundance of practice problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wildner

customer_reviews.title: Practical choice
customer_reviews.text: Great amount of tests and study guide for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Math..
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed. I thought I was doing well with the math as it was presented but then I got to the practice test...
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good material, but it's a carbon copy of the first edition. Same practice questions and review material.
customer_reviews.text: Good material, but it's a carbon copy of the first edition. Same practice questions and review material. I already had the first edition and thought this one would have newer questions to practice. When I got it I was disappointed to find all of the quantitative practice tests were carbon copies of the first edition. There were some very minor changes to wording in the explanations.The first edition can be found online in PDF format if you google around.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Duplicate materials
customer_reviews.text: This is silly - if you buy this you are buying the SAME material printed in three different books. Completely redundant.
customer_reviews.author: HMK.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to study for my upcoming GRE exam! Arrived in good condition and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to save money and get the exact same information
customer_reviews.text: Same as the book 3 pack offered on the official GRE website. Way better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parker

customer_reviews.title: Received in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Received these books last week and they were in good condition. A good way to prep for the upcoming GRE.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Seo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the book. Brand new, delivered on time, and well packaged. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sarani

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for GRE, half the price of what it could’ve been when I ordered my test!
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So helpful and cheaper than going to the local bookstore.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: so these books are great, that is if you put them to use
customer_reviews.text: Found this valuable. Helped me improve my quant score. Although I missed my goal of 158 (I got a 156) I did see more than a 10 point improvement, so these books are great, that is if you put them to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dedan

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: If you're planning on taking the GRE anytime in the near future. You MUST get this pack. There are literally hundreds of practice questions to prepare you for the real exam. These books are written by the same people who write the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It’s helpfull for getting an idea of the test but as far as something that will help you get a great score, I much prefer the Princeton Review GRE ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from amazon because was much cheaper than buying directly from ETS. It’s helpfull for getting an idea of the test but as far as something that will help you get a great score, I much prefer the Princeton Review GRE prep items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is good because it is questions that are the most similar ...
customer_reviews.text: the main book is the most helpful because it explains everything. Overall it is good because it is questions that are the most similar to what will be on the GRE, since it is made by the test makers. However it is best for practice but not so much for learning new materials. It is essential however so i would recommend buying at least the main book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vocab doesn't match the test vocab. The math practice ...
customer_reviews.text: Vocab doesn't match the test vocab. The math practice is decent, but there will still be types of problems on the test not included in these books. Also some overlap between the main one and 2 other ones.
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: Still studying the exam. Helpful and as described, but pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for preparing for the GREs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found it very helpful. She did several of the practice test and it gave her the needed confidence to take the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chem Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery
customer_reviews.text: it was great delivery. and packing status was pretty good. I'll recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ahn

customer_reviews.title: And one more thing I have just spended like a few hours working with it and it's began ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this superpack, because I prefer work with books, but guys you can find it for free online and download it. Anyway this is not new one, the same material you can find in first edition. And one more thing I have just spended like a few hours working with it and it's began to falling apart not really a good quality I think. It was totally new and I think It will look worse in a few weeks of using. Hopefully these books will help to get a good score)
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than buying it at the book store. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She is getting so much out of these books as she prepares for the GRE
customer_reviews.author: Clements

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use these to study for the GRE-- they are made by the test maker.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: GRE Ready.
customer_reviews.text: I got this at an amzing price and will add this bundle to my other GRE prep books.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My son use this and he loved her for helping out with his college GRE test
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good Study Aids
customer_reviews.text: Great books. There is a wealth of material included in this "Power Pack"

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great book so far. Great explanations for practice tests so you know why you missed it.
customer_reviews.author: SS18
